entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
